Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.managers.patterns

Class SpecificPattern

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.managers.patterns.Pattern
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.managers.patterns.SpecificPattern
public class SpecificPattern extends Pattern
A specific pattern with multiple flags and variables allowing for customization

  • Constructor Details

    • SpecificPattern

      public SpecificPattern(String name, List<List<List<Boolean>>> masks, int groupNum, boolean sgc, int minC, int maxC) throws InvalidPatternParameterException
      Creates a specific pattern with the given parameters
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the pattern
      masks - a list of matrix representing the acceptable shapes of the groups, must be immutable
      groupNum - the minimum number of groups to be found to return the points (and not 0)
      sgc - should all the groups have the same color?
      minC - minimum number of colors in the same group
      maxC - maximum number of colors in the same group
      Throws:
      InvalidPatternParameterException - if parameters are invalid

    • SpecificPattern

      public SpecificPattern(String name, List<List<List<Boolean>>> masks, int groupNum, boolean sgc, int minC, int maxC, boolean fe) throws InvalidPatternParameterException
      Creates a specific pattern with the given parameters
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the pattern
      masks - a list of matrix representing the acceptable shapes of the groups, must be immutable
      groupNum - the minimum number of groups to be found to return the points (and not 0)
      sgc - should all the groups have the same color?
      minC - minimum number of colors in the same group
      maxC - maximum number of colors in the same group
      fe - if set to true, cells set to false in any of the mask will require the corresponding slot in the bookshelf to be empty
      Throws:
      InvalidPatternParameterException - if parameters are invalid

  • Method Details

    • checkParameters

      private void checkParameters() throws InvalidPatternParameterException
      Checks the constructor parameters
      Throws:
      InvalidPatternParameterException - if the parameters are invalid

    • getPatternFunction

      public Function<List<List<Optional<Tile>>>,Integer> getPatternFunction()
      Returns the pattern function
      Specified by:
      getPatternFunction in class Pattern
      Returns:
      a function that given the bookshelf checks if it satisfies the pattern, and if it does, then 1 is returned (that could be interpreted as the number of points or just used to check if it satisfies the pattern), otherwise 0.

    • isSequenceValid

      private static Boolean isSequenceValid(List<Set<Tile>> sequence, int groupNum, boolean sgc)
      Parameters:
      sequence - a list of groups
      groupNum - the minimum number of groups to be found for it to be valid
      sgc - should all the groups have the same color?
      Returns:
      is the sequence valid according to groupNum and sgc

    • transposeMasks

      private static List<List<List<Boolean>>> transposeMasks(List<List<List<Boolean>>> masks)
      Parameters:
      masks - the masks to transpose
      Returns:
      Transposed masks: a list of "matrix" columns x rows

    • getAllGroups

      private static List<List<Tile>> getAllGroups(List<List<Optional<Tile>>> bookshelf, List<List<List<Boolean>>> masks, int minColor, int maxColor, boolean forceEmpty)
      Parameters:
      masks - a list of matrix representing the acceptable shapes of the groups
      minColor - minimum number of colors in the same group
      maxColor - maximum number of colors in the same group
      forceEmpty - if set to true, cells set to false in any of the mask will require the corresponding slot in the bookshelf to be empty
      Returns:
      a list of groups (lists of tiles) representing all the groups that satisfy: at least one of the masks (accounting for force empty), the minimum and maximum amount of different colors

    • findGoodSequence

      private static Boolean findGoodSequence(List<Set<Tile>> startingGroups, int minGroups, boolean sgc)
      Parameters:
      startingGroups - a list of groups
      minGroups - the minimum number of groups to be found for it to be valid
      sgc - should all the groups have the same color?
      Returns:
      true, when: no groups in the sequence have overlapping tiles and the sequence satisfies the predicate returned from isSequenceValid

    • removeOverlapping

      private static BiFunction<List<Set<Tile>>,Set<Tile>,Boolean> removeOverlapping()
      Returns:
      a bifunction that given the sequence of groups and a mainGroup: removes all groups overlapping with mainGroup from the sequence returns true if any have been removed

    • getTransposedMasks

      public static List<List<List<Boolean>>> getTransposedMasks(List<List<List<Boolean>>> masks)
      used for testing
      Parameters:
      masks - the original masks
      Returns:
      the transposed masks
